00031                 {
00032                         $this->geoips = array(Geoip::by_ip_addr('147.163.1.5'),

00040                 public function hits_by_host()
00041                 {
00042                         global $db;
00043                         
00044                         $db->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00045                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00046                                         "WHERE `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00047                                         "AND `date` >= '{2}' " .
00048                                         "AND (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{3}%' " .
00049                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''%{3}%') " .
00050                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{4}%' " .
00051                                         "AND `user_agent` LIKE '%{5}%' " .
00052                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00053                                         "HAVING `weight` >= '{6}' AND `weight` <= '{7}' " .
00054                                         "ORDER BY `weight` DESC " .
00055                                         "LIMIT {8}",
00056                                         @$_REQUEST['p'],
00057                                         date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])),
00058                                         @$_REQUEST['f'],
00059                                         @$_REQUEST['r'],
00060                                         @$_REQUEST['u'],
00061                                         @$_REQUEST['l'],
00062                                         @$_REQUEST['h'],
00063                                         9999);
00064                         $result = $db->exec();
00065                         
00066                         $this->hosts = array();
00067                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00068                         {
00069                                 while ($line = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00070                                 {
00071                                         $host = Geoip::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00072                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00073                                         $this->hosts[] = $host;
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                 }

00109                 public function last_n_visits($n)
00110                 {
00111                         global $db;
00112                         
00113                         $db->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00114                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00115                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00116                                         "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00117                                         "LIMIT {1}",
00118                                         $n * 3);
00119                         $result = $db->exec();
00120                         
00121                         $this->hosts = array();
00122                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00123                         {
00124                                 $i = 0;
00125                                 while ($line = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00126                                 {
00127                                         $host = Geoip::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00128                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00129                                         if (!(empty($host->latitude) && empty($host->longitude)))
00130                                         {
00131                                                 $this->hosts[] = $host;
00132                                                 $i++;
00133                                         }
00134                                         if ($i >= $n)
00135                                         {
00136                                                 break;
00137                                         }
00138                                 }
00139                         }
00140                         $this->render(array('action' => 'hits_by_host'));
00141                 }
00142         }
